trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Rockingham
There were no other sightings in Rockingham on or around December 17th 1979
divs: Sighting DetailsI was riding my 5 year old nephew on bike facing east in Rockingham N.C. and looked up and saw a reddish giagantic planet(it was very large), almost covered half the sky and didn't move). There were trees in front of it so I decided to get away from the trees to see it better.I took my eyes off it and when I looked again, it was gone.It was like nothing I had ever seen and had no idea what it was.I never felt afraid ( I should have). I called the Hamlet N.C. police and reported it and they didn't know anything but said another woman had reported it.
Summary: It looked like a giagantic planet
